body_html:
From the cmake file i see that it needs the same, Though it did not occured to be on windows 10. nsync there forced rebuild every time. but it did not occured to me. I guess depends on the build systems. cmake that produces msbuild project files work with dates to check dependencies. I am not familiar with bazel and ninja though, if they check contents of the file, may be different. anyway, i will investigate more for highwash, may be it was not compiled in my build.
…

body:
From the cmake file i see that it needs the same,
Though it did not occured to be on windows 10.
nsync there forced rebuild every time.
but it did not occured to me.
I guess depends on the build systems. cmake that produces msbuild project
files work with dates to check dependencies. I am not familiar with bazel
and ninja though, if they check contents of the file, may be different.
anyway, i will investigate more for highwash, may be it was not compiled in
my build.
